clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For the treatment of dwarfism prevention of HIV induced weight loss

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Sermorelin is used in the treatment of children with growth hormone deficiency or growth failure Geref increases plasma growth hormone GH concentration by stimulating the pituitary gland to release GH Geref is similar to the full length native hormone 44 residues in its ability to stimulate GH secretion in humans
